This stunning extension features high-quality animated visuals of Rapunzel, her magical golden hair, and her adventures with Flynn Rider. Perfect for fans of Disney’s Tangled, it transforms your browser into a beautiful fairytale experience in crystal-clear 4K quality.

Dive into Rapunzel’s world every time you open a new tab!

Features:
🌟 Live 4K Wallpaper: Beautiful, high-definition animations of Rapunzel’s magical moments and iconic scenes.
🌐 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites instantly with pre-set shortcuts.
➕ Addable Shortcuts: Customize your tab with personalized links to your go-to sites.
🔍 Search Bar: Quickly search the web using your preferred search engine.
🕒 Calendar & Clock: Stay on track with the built-in clock and calendar.
Why Choose This Extension?
Lightweight and secure, this extension is designed for a seamless user experience while respecting your privacy. It’s easy to install and remove through your browser settings.

Explore more live wallpapers featuring Disney’s beloved characters and magical adventures. The extension includes a note-taking tool, a privacy policy, and a quick uninstall option.

Download the Rapunzel 4K Wallpaper today and bring the magic of Tangled to your Chrome browser. Visit our website for even more enchanting live wallpapers!
